attributes.action: Guarantee, without strings attached or a lengthy application process, the £5.7 million worth of deposits Naomi House Children's Hospice has with the British based Icelandic bank Kaupthing Singer and Friedlander.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a result of the recent developments in the banking sector, and the wider global economy, Naomi House currently has a total sum of £5.7 million worth of  deposits at risk with the British based Icelandic bank Kaupthing Singer and Friedlander.

We are asking for clarification that this sum will be honoured through the commitments Government has made as part of the recent support package announced.

rejection.details: As this is relates to an individual case, this is a matter best discussed with HM Treasury direct.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
